items.preText: 6:14pm Here we go. Guptill facing. Slip in place for Mortaza.
items.text: length ball wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket's left on the up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: thick outside edge down to third man. Length at off stump, closes the face on it too early
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.preText: Around the wicket to the left-hander
items.text: length and in at middle stump. Poked to midwicket with the angle
items.postText: Rickyg: "Are we likely to have an interruption for sun strike this evening?" --- We're entering that territory, yeah. Usually around 7pm that it happens, so we'll keep an eye on it around the 10th over
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length and in at leg stump. Cops it on the pad as he tries to flick this
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's left off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: full outswinger outside off. Angled bat drive to mid-off's right. Mashrafe with a tumbling stop there
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.preText: Stays over the wicket. Slip goes a couple of steps wider for the left-hander
items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length with some late swing inwards. Raps him on the outside of his pad as he looks to flick
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: short of a length at off stump, defended to cover on the up
items.postText: Slip is not merely a couple of steps wide now. Almost a third slip position at the moment.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball slanted across off stump, left alone
items.postText: Optimist: "@Rickyg, nah Guppy and Nicols will smash it out before then. " --- Any time now...
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, allows it to come on and flicks this handsomely in front of square
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, punched to mid-on's right on the rise
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length and in at middle stump. Defended with the angle to midwicket
items.postText: Mashrafe hovering about an average speed of 125kph
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, jabbed to mid-off on the rise
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full and in at leg stump, looks to flick. It's off his front pad and in front of short fine
items.postText: Brendan J : "I know it's really early to call it but I don't mind these two opening. I think Munro has a place but down at 5 or 6, iffffffffffff it's a batting wicket. Otherwise Neesham deserves to keep him out. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 1 run

items.preText: Sadi: "A very good opportunity for Saifuddin to be the regular member of BD team. Lets see if he can grab the opportunity."
items.text: length at off stump, defended down the pitch off the front foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, punched against the angle to mid-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball swung down leg side, can't connect on the flick
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 wide

items.text: length at leg stump, looks to flick, cops it on the thigh pad
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on off stump, punched on the rise to mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length and slanted in at leg stump. Allows it to come on and flicks to the backward square leg boundary
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: low full toss outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, no run
